short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to know when hJune is live.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
-Gives you a notification when hJune is live on Twitch.tv
-Contains his social media links
-Embeds his latest youtube video inside the extension's popup
-Shows you information about the ongoing live (title, game, viewer count)

If you wish to report any bug, or submit any suggestion, please do so by directly commenting on the application's page in the web store, or by mail at: hjune.dev@gmail.com
